description: Stroll Munich's galleries and halls—sonic echoes of masterpieces, soft Bavarian light.

items.name: Residenz museum
items.entry_fee_text: INR 560 approx for Residenz Museum & Treasury, INR 280 approx for Cuvilliés-Theatre and INR 1000 approx for Combined ticket.

items.name: Pinakothek der Moderne
items.entry_fee_text: Regular INR 800 approx, Reduced INR 560 and on Sundays INR 80 approx.

items.name: The Munich Stadtmuseum
items.entry_fee_text: INR 560 approx and free for persons under 18.

items.name: The Bavarian National Museum
items.entry_fee_text: from INR 320 to INR 640 (depending on what you want to visit) and free for children under 18.

items.name: Beer and Oktoberfest Museum
items.entry_fee_text: INR 500 approx (museum entry only) and INR 760 approx (museum entry and beer tasting)

items.name: The Brandhorst Museum
items.entry_fee_text: Regular admission INR 560 approx, Reduced INR 400 approx and INR 80 approx on Sundays.

items.name: BMW Museum
items.entry_fee_text: INR 720 approx, children up to 18 years: INR 480 approx.

items.name: Haus der Kunst
items.entry_fee_text: INR 1120 approx and free for children under 12.
